pr_title: DROOLS-3843: [DMN Editor] Decision Navigator differentiate icons for DRGElement

timeline.message: Decorating type with related node class name
Adding a different type for each navigator item element
Unit testing Type logic retrieval + refactoring
Adding rules also for other node types
Only icon in the first level should be affected
Icons should be big enough to be shown in the graph

timeline.bodyText: Can you please use the same assertions (JUnit) used below? import static org.junit.Assert.assertThat

replies.bodyText:
It was intentional the use of assertj Assertions.assertThat() instead of junit Assert.assertThat, because in my opinion it gives a cleaner way to understand what it is being asserted
Here is an interesting article about that: https://dzone.com/articles/the-benefit-of-using-assertthat-over-other-assert
Please let me know your opinion
